_sText:
==================THIS IS THE LAST VERSION OF ERUPTION==================

**V5 >>>> Fix**

- Main crash for the second level is resolved
- Teleport bug resolved
- More FPS
- Fight with nazgul is more fun
- 2 humvees to escape
- More damages with laser
- ALL LITTLES BUGS RESOLVED


==================MUSIC OF LMFAO (sexy and i know it) IS AVIABLE IN THE MAP==================


    64 players max
    4 different difficulties
    1 Boss
    randomised medkits
    random weapons
    1 Radio
    particles
    3 Specials weapons USE WEAPONS WITH "USE / E"
    Full compiled (with HDR)

This map has been test with 35 people on FRAG OF GENERATION server escape and no problems has been detected


PLEASE DOWNLOAD THIS MAP
